channel.title: A REAPER MISSION
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "A REAPER MISSION" - never get it

item.title: Re: A REAPER MISSION
item.content:encoded: Actually you can get his mission even as a chunin. I tried to bruteforce him as a chunin, but is only lucky to pass the 2nd stat check but failed the third one. After I got shikai and is already a sp. jonin, I tried again and succeeded on first try.

item.title: Re: A REAPER MISSION
item.content:encoded: Most people Season 4+ could probably brute force it. I'm Season 3, and I'll likely be able to do it next Season if I want to.

item.title: Re: A REAPER MISSION
item.content:encoded: which is quite hard. So for practical purposes you'll need Jonin lvl to get him, but technically it's possible to get him at Sp. Jonin.

item.title: Re: A REAPER MISSION
item.content:encoded: You mean people can Brute force 20/20 as Sp.Jonin? Wow.

item.title: Re: A REAPER MISSION
item.content:encoded: Mr. Tea is obtainable as a Sp. Jonin, but you have to be able to pass a series of 20d20s missions.

item.title: Re: A REAPER MISSION
item.content:encoded:
YUP..
A-rank reaper mission. ehmmm Jonin lv….. ehmmm…. thats why…..
btw, then bvs should change the requirement for mister tea as Jonin not Sp.Jonin
or are u can win mr.tea w/o A-rank Reaper Allies Jutsu ??

item.title: Re: A REAPER MISSION
item.content:encoded:
Do you mean a A-rank reaper mission?

If so, the missions ranks in reaper are the same as regular missions.

Genin = D-rank
Chunin = C-Rank
Sp Jonin = B rank
Jonin = A-rank

item.title: A REAPER MISSION
item.content:encoded:
is a "A reaper mission" need Special Jonin Level to get it, especially at S2 ??
tq
